Articles.Content:
So as the title suggests, I wanna build a pc with a budget of $700. This is what I got so far.

http://pcpartpicker.com/user/MrKicker/saved/22C1

I want this pc to be able to run Ksp and other games that need on the gpu.

I would like some segestions.
You might want to ask the fine folks in this thread instead. This part of the forum is really only meant to be about gameplay questions.

Note, all new PCs and laptops can be plugged into any flat screen TVs of either 720 or 1080P. They all come with the RGB connector. Many graphic cards and laptops come with HDMI connection which is preferred over the RGB one. You can save the cost of a monitor and buy more computer.

Recommend that you go to an independent shop to have one built to your specs and budget. That way, you won't have to deal with the bloatware found on the packaged Big Box systems.
Spend the extra cash, get an 8320 processor. Oh, and if you want a solid video card, get the Geforce GTX 660.
